intro.description: The objective of this task is to manage and control the service provided for the cloud provider in order to contract the most appropriate one for the organisation´s requirements, and to monitor, measure and control that the agreement is fulfilled.

item.title: CPMP.A1 - Define the main features to be fulfilled by the cloud provider
item.description: This activity should define the features regarding to technical aspects such us type of Data base, programming language, availability, scalability metrics and to business aspects such us pricing model, standards compliance etc. , that the cloud provider should provide.

item.title: CPMP.A2 - Select cloud provider
item.description: This activity should select a cloud provider based on an evaluation of their ability to meet the specified requirements and established criteria

item.title: CPMP.A3 - Establish the cloud provider agreement
item.description: This activity should reflect the agreement with the cloud provider. This agreement can be a contract, license, service level agreement, or memorandum of agreement. The most common way to do this agreement will be a SLA with the cloud provider

item.title: CPMP.A4 - Monitor the fulfilment of the conditions
item.description: This activity should monitor, as defined in the agreement, the fulfilment of the conditions and characteristics defined by the agreement. Most of the cloud providers provide their own tools to facilitate the monitoring of their cloud services.

item.title: CPMP.A5 - Report and control the non-fulfilment
item.description: The Cloud provider monitoring and reporting mechanisms must be defined and agreed with the cloud provider. The periodic reports should incorporate details of performance against all cloud provider SLA targets. It is important for elaborating these reports to collect accurate information from all the areas and other processes and measured against the agreed business targets. During this activity, reports on non-fulfilments report should be produced and propagated to the affected parts. In case of non-fulfilments, It could be necessary to start again all the task, starting in the activity CPMP.A1.
